WildFly 38 Model Reference

  1. home
  2. subsystem=infinispan
  3. cache-container
  4. cache
  5. component=locking

The locking configuration of the cache.

Runtime only resource This resource is runtime only and doesn't have any persistent configuration.

Attributes (3)

  • current-concurrency-level The estimated number of concurrently updating threads which this cache can support.
    • Deprecated Since 17.0.0
    Deprecated. Returns the concurrency-level with which the cache was configured.
    Attribute Value
    Type INT
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • number-of-locks-available The number of locks available to this cache.
    • Attribute Value
    Type INT
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
  • number-of-locks-held The number of locks currently in use by this cache.
    • Attribute Value
    Type INT
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability default
